EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Auto Response - Oct16 ILTA Flow Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}: Thank you for registering for the BPM / Workflow & Legal Practice Automation with Intapp Flow Webinar, happening on Tuesday, October 25th at 1pm PST / 4pm EST. Please use the link below to add the event to your calendar, which contains the login information to access the webinar.
Add to Calendar:http://www.intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/ILTA_Webinar_Intapp_Flow.ics
